unnormalised: Choosing a payment gateway is harder than deciding what to eat for Onam Sadhya! So many options, yaar! PayU, Razorpay, BillDesk... it's a proper chakravyuh!
normalised: Choosing a payment gateway is harder than deciding what to eat for Onam Sadhya! So many options, yaar! P A Y U, Razorpay, BillDesk... it's a proper chakravyuh!

unnormalised: Hope my customers' money doesn't go *poof* like that jinn from Alif Laila.
normalised: Hope my customers' money doesn't go *poof* like that jinn from Alif Laila.

unnormalised: Seriously, if I have one more failed transaction I'm going to scream louder than a Delhi wedding band. Someone send help (and maybe some biryani).
normalised: Seriously, if I have one more failed transaction I'm going to scream louder than a Delhi wedding band. Someone send help (and maybe some biryani).
